login.signup: Not a member yet? Sign up.

signup.topText: Hopi knows you from your pocket!
signup.topText2: You should write the email address and password you want to use for your Hopi membership in the field below.

welcome.topText2: What do you want to do with Hopi?

welcomeBar.paracik: 1 Paracık = 1₺ and you can use it.

myQRCode.text: You can benefit from the offers by scanning the QR code at the checkout or by typing the code below for online shopping.
myQRCode.text2: QR code will be refreshed in!

myWallet.midText: You can spend at least 1.50 TL at all brands that have an agreement with Hopi.

balance.text1: Hopipay is a free virtual card that you can easily load money into and use for spending anywhere you want. With this card, you can:
balance.text2: Spend your money at Hopi-affiliated brands.
balance.text3: Send money to your friends instantly.
balance.text4: Shop easily on all e-commerce sites.

cards.text2: Save your cards to Masterpass and easily pay with Hopi mobile payment.
cards.text5: Load your Istanbulkart with Paracık by adding it to your cards.
